function.name: write_to_file
function.description: Write string content to a file.

file_path.description: Full file name with path where the content will be written.

text.description: Text content to be written into the file.

encoding.description: Encoding to use for writing the file. Defaults to 'utf-8'.

function.name: read_file
function.description: Read a file and return its contents as a string.

file_path.description: The full file name with path to read.

encoding.description: The encoding used to decode the file. Defaults to 'utf-8'.

function.name: scan_folder
function.description: Scan a directory recursively for files with path with depth 2. You can also use this function to understand the folder structure in a given folder path.
function.return_type: list: A list of file paths str with the given extension, or all files if no extension is specified.

function.name: run_python_script
function.description: Execute a Python script in a subprocess.

script_name.description: The name with path of the script to be executed.
